* [An Introduction to R](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/R-intro.pdf): Downloadable PDF for new R users
* [Quick-R](https://www.statmethods.net/): Useful resource for beginners
* [CRAN Task Views](https://cran.r-project.org/web/views/): R packages by topic
* [Advanced R](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/): Hadley Wickham's Guide to Advanced R Programming
* [DataCamp](https://www.datacamp.com/): Interactive courses & tutorials for learning R programming
* [Customizing RStudio](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200549016-Customizing-RStudio#general): RStudio Software Preference Guide
* [RStudio Connections](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/115010915687): Guide to connecting RStudio to data sources
